005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IIPv4AddressItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.EQNameFactory;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016
017import java.util.List;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020import inet.ipaddr.AddressStringException;
021import inet.ipaddr.IPAddressString;
022import inet.ipaddr.IPAddressStringParameters;
023import inet.ipaddr.IncompatibleAddressException;
024import inet.ipaddr.ipv4.IPv4Address;
025
026/**
027 * Support for the Metaschema <a href=
028 * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v4-address">ip-v4-address</a>
029 * data type.
030 */
031public class IPv4AddressAdapter
032    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<IPv4Address, IIPv4AddressItem> {
033  @NonNull
034  private static final List<IEnhancedQName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
035      List.of(
036          EQNameFactory.instance().newQName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "ip-v4-address")));
037  private static final IPAddressStringParameters IP_V_4;
038
039  static {
040    IP_V_4 = new IPAddressStringParameters.Builder()
041        .allowIPv6(false)
042        .allowEmpty(false)
043        .allowSingleSegment(false)
044        .allowWildcardedSeparator(false)
045        .getIPv4AddressParametersBuilder()
046        .allowBinary(false)
047        .allowLeadingZeros(false)
048        .allowPrefixesBeyondAddressSize(false)
049        .getParentBuilder()
050        .toParams();
051  }
052
053  IPv4AddressAdapter() {
054    super(IPv4Address.class, IIPv4AddressItem.class, IIPv4AddressItem::cast);
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public List<IEnhancedQName> getNames() {
059    return NAMES;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
064    return JsonFormatTypes.STRING;
065  }
066
067  @SuppressWarnings("null")
068  @Override
069  public IPv4Address parse(String value) {
070    try {
071      return (IPv4Address) new IPAddressString(value, IP_V_4).toAddress();
072    } catch (AddressStringException | IncompatibleAddressException ex) {
073      throw new IllegalArgumentException(ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
074    }
075  }
076
077  @Override
078  public IPv4Address copy(Object obj) {
079    // value is immutable
080    return (IPv4Address) obj;
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public IIPv4AddressItem newItem(Object value) {
085    IPv4Address item = toValue(value);
086    return IIPv4AddressItem.valueOf(item);
087  }
088}
